QuestData.Title: Bad Yak
QuestData.Description: Is this the place where they replace defective yaks?$b$bCan anybody help me out, here?
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Bluesaddle replace his defective yak.
QuestData.CompletionText: This yak is not a good yak. Not at all.
QuestData.RewardText: I think we made a pretty convincing argument. They'll HAVE to replace my yak now.
